lead_paragraph: American Airlines reported a record profit for the fourth quarter and all of 2015 as a sharp drop in fuel prices more than offset lower revenue.

headline.print_headline: American Reports Record Earnings for an Airline
headline.main: American Reports Record Earnings for an Airline

snippet: American Airlines reported a record profit for the fourth quarter and all of 2015 as a sharp drop in fuel prices more than offset lower revenue.
abstract: American Airlines Group reports fourth quarter net income of $3.28 billion due in large part to large accounting gain from tax item; without tax advantage and other one-time monetary events, American says it earned $1.3 billion, or $2 per share, up from $1.1 billion, or $1.52 per share one year earlier.
